amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 118-516 to add a sense of Congress to the end of title V that nothing in this Act or any amendment made by this Act should be interpreted to authorize any entity to regulate any commodity, other than a digital commodity, on any spot market.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 191 (Roll no. 225).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 191 (Roll no. 225).
